SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
The AmbientLight class represents ambient light in a scene.
Camera
Camera class represents a camera in 3D space.
Camera.Builder
Builder class for constructing a Camera instance.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Represents a cylinder in 3D space, extending along a given axis with a specified height.
CylinderTest
Unit tests for the geometries.Cylinder class.
DirectionalLight
The DirectionalLight class represents a light source that has a specific direction and intensity.
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
Represents a collection of intersectable geometries in a scene.
Geometry
Abstract class representing geometric shapes in a 3D scene.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTests
ImageWriter class unit tests
Intersectable
Abstract class representing geometric shapes that can be intersected by rays.
Intersectable.GeoPoint
Inner class representing a geometric intersection point with its corresponding geometry.
Light
The Light class represents a generic light source.
LightSource
The LightSource interface represents a light source in a scene.
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
The Material class represents the material properties of an object.
Plane
Represents a plane in 3D space.
Point
Represents a point in 3D space.
PointLight
The PointLight class represents a point light source in a scene.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
RadialGeometry
Abstract class representing a radial geometry in 3D space.
Ray
Represents a ray in 3D space, defined by a starting point (head) and a direction.
RayTracerBase
Abstract base class for ray tracers in a rendering engine.
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
The Scene class represents a scene in a ray tracing application.
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
SimpleRayTracer
The SimpleRayTracer class implements a basic ray tracing algorithm for rendering scenes.
Sphere
Represents a sphere in 3D space, defined by its center point and radius.
SpotLight
The SpotLight class represents a spotlight source in a scene.
Triangle
Represents a triangle in 3D space, defined by its three vertices.
Tube
Represents a tube in 3D space, defined by its radius and axis.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
Represents a 3D vector with x, y, and z components.
